TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 320
TEI.2.document_title: S M Williams to Josiah H Bell, 01-06-1830

barker_notes.barker_summary: S. M. Williams to Josiah H. Bell, January 9, 1830. Receipt for four hogs for Austin.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 320

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*S. M. Williams to Josiah H. Bell, January 9, 1830. Receipt for four hogs for Austin.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*Recd of *person_mentioned*James Bell*/person_mentioned* for *person_mentioned*Stephen F. Austin*/person_mentioned* four hogs whose weight is estimated at 85 pounds and should they weigh more*person_mentioned* Mr, Bell*/person_mentioned* will be allowed the excess*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Saml M Williams*/person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="01-09-1830">Jany 9 1830*/date_mentioned* */p* */div1*
